verses.verse: "So it shall be when<WH3588> all<WH3605> of these<WH428> things<WH1697> have come<WH935> upon you, the blessing<WH1293> and the curse<WH7045> which<WH834> I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you, and you call<WH7725> [them] to mind<WH3824> in all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> where<WH834> <WH8033> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has banished<WH5080> you,

and you return<WH7725> to the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> and obey<WH8085> <WH6963> Him with all<WH3605> your heart<WH3824> and soul<WH5315> according to all<WH3605> that I command<WH6680> you today,<WH3117> you and your sons,<WH1121>

then the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will restore<WH7725> you from captivity,<WH7622> and have<WH7355> compassion<WH7355> on you, and will gather<WH6908> you again<WH7725> from all<WH3605> the peoples<WH5971> where<WH834> <WH8033> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has scattered<WH6327> you.

"If<WH518> your outcasts<WH5080> are at the ends<WH7097> of the earth,<WH8064> from there<WH8033> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will gather<WH6908> you, and from there<WH8033> He will bring<WH3947> you back.

"And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will bring<WH935> you into the land<WH776> which<WH834> your fathers possessed,<WH1> and you shall possess<WH3423> it; and He will prosper<WH3423> you and multiply<WH3190> you more<WH7235> than<WH4480> your fathers.

"Moreover the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will circumcise<WH4135> your heart<WH3824> and the heart<WH3824> of your descendants,<WH2233> to love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all<WH3605> your heart<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> your soul,<WH5315> in order<WH4616> that you may live.<WH9132>
"And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will inflict<WH5414> all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH423> on your enemies<WH340> and on those who hate<WH8130> you, who<WH834> persecuted<WH7291> you.
"And you shall again<WH7725> obey<WH8085> <WH6963> the Lord,<WH3068> and observe<WH6213> all<WH3605> His commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you today.<WH3117>

"Then the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will prosper<WH3498> you abundantly<WH3498> in all<WH3605> the work<WH4639> of your hand,<WH3027> in the offspring<WH6529> of your body<WH990> and in the offspring<WH6529> of your cattle<WH929> and in the produce<WH6529> of your ground,<WH127> for the Lord<WH3068> will again<WH7725> rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> you for good,<WH9185> just<WH9201> as He rejoiced<WH7797> over<WH5921> your fathers;

if<WH3588> you obey<WH8085> <WH6963> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> to keep<WH8104> His commandments<WH4687> and His statutes<WH2708> which are written<WH3789> in this<WH2088> book<WH5612> of the law,<WH8451> if<WH3588> you turn<WH7725> to the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all<WH3605> your heart<WH3824> and soul.<WH5315>
"For this<WH2088> commandment<WH4687> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you today<WH3117> is not too<WH4480> difficult<WH6381> for you, nor<WH3808> is it out of reach.<WH7350>

"It is not in heaven,<WH8064> that you should say,<WH559> 'Who<WH4310> will go<WH5927> up to heaven<WH8064> for us to get<WH3947> it for us and make us hear<WH8085> it, that we may observe<WH6213> it?'

"Nor<WH3808> is it beyond<WH4480> <WH5676> the sea,<WH3220> that you should say,<WH559> 'Who<WH4310> will cross<WH5674> the sea<WH3220> for us to get<WH3947> it for us and make us hear<WH8085> it, that we may observe<WH6213> it?'
"But the word<WH1697> is very<WH3966> near<WH7138> you, in your mouth<WH6310> and in your heart,<WH3824> that you may observe<WH6213> it.
"See,<WH7200> I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you today<WH3117> life<WH9132> and prosperity,<WH9185> and death<WH4194> and adversity;<WH9563>

in that I command<WH6680> you today<WH3117> to love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to walk<WH1980> in His ways<WH1870> and to keep<WH8104> His commandments<WH4687> and His statutes<WH2708> and His judgments,<WH4941> that you may live<WH2421> and multiply,<WH7235> and that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> may bless<WH1288> you in the land<WH776> where<WH834> <WH8033> you are entering<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.
"But if<WH518> your heart<WH3824> turns<WH6437> away<WH6437> and you will not obey,<WH8085> but are drawn<WH5080> away<WH5080> and worship<WH7812> other<WH312> gods<WH430> and serve<WH5647> them,

I declare<WH5046> to you today<WH3117> that you shall surely perish. You shall not prolong<WH6> [your] days<WH6> in the land<WH748> where<WH3117> <WH127> you are crossing<WH834> the Jordan<WH8033> to enter<WH5674> and possess<WH3383> it.

"I call<WH5749> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> to witness<WH5749> against you today,<WH3117> that I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you life<WH9132> and death,<WH4194> the blessing<WH1293> and the curse.<WH7045> So choose<WH977> life<WH9132> in order<WH4616> that you may live,<WH2421> you and your descendants,<WH2233>

by loving<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> by obeying<WH8085> His voice,<WH6963> and by holding<WH1692> fast<WH1692> to Him; for this<WH1931> is your life<WH9132> and the length<WH753> of your days,<WH3117> that you may live<WH3427> in the land<WH127> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to your fathers, to Abraham,<WH1> Isaac,<WH85> and Jacob,<WH3327> to give<WH3290> them. "
